directions: In a  medium saucepan, mix dried apricots, dark brown sugar, raisins and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and simmer 5 minutes, stirring constantly.
Mix in cranberries, apple and lemon zest. Simmer 10 minutes.
Mix in lemon juice, crystallized ginger and red pepper flakes. Serve at room temperature or chilled.
ingredients: 1/2 cup firmly packed dark brown sugar
1 Granny Smith apple - peeled, cored and diced
title: Spicy Cranberry Chutney
